name: 15 2D Unity Games Bundle
description:
This bundle contains 15 Unity Games from various genre – puzzle, adventure, hyper-casual. All these games are compatible for android, iOS, WebGL, PC, linux, macOS and many other platforms that Unity supports.

You get complete source code for each of these projects.

To open these project you will need Unity 2019.4.0 or any newer version.

  1. Boom Ballz: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ttCwyDWRZak
  2. Brick Breaker: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKot4BHTvwU
  3. Color Blocks: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MTWwYRJNBcs
  4. Neon Space Fighter: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T7AbSXMgMWk
  5. Rolling Maze: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cb5Y9l5aV-Y
  6. Catch the balls: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YlsrrMFEYEI
  7. Ice cube jump: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RWCYlKuFGbE
  8. Infinite line runner: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4QnZJY7LrR8
  9. Throw the hand grenade: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B4cVUr4sQwY
  10. Rush but don’t crush: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j6pZ17-mP6M
  11. Stupid Arrow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CCQr_bXGxkE
  12. Find The Hole: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IDSlc5aJ8FA
  13. Through The Hoop: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R7Xs_6QblWI
  14. Circular Brick Breaker: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w7KB49t22-Y
  15. Neon Yellow Ball: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7c2xSr-odR4

All these games are ready for release on play store, app store or any other store. You can reskin them and put ads in no time.
